trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_BORDERSELECT - When an item is selected the border color of the item changes

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_CHECKBOXES - Enables check boxes for items in a list-view control

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_CHECKBOXES - Enables check boxes for items in a list-view control

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_DOUBLEBUFFER - Paints via double-buffering, which reduces flicker

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_FLATSB - Enables flat scroll bars in the list view

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_FLATSB - Enables flat scroll bars in the list view

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_FULLROWSELECT - When an item is selected, the item and all its subitems are highlighted

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_INFOTIP - The $LVN_GETINFOTIP notification message is sent before displaying a ToolTip

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_LABELTIP - If not set, the unfolds partly hidden labels only for the large icon mode

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_MULTIWORKAREAS - The control will not autoarrange its icons until one or more work areas are defined

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_MULTIWORKAREAS - The control will not autoarrange its icons until one or more work areas are defined

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_REGIONAL - Sets the control region to include only the item icons and text

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_SIMPLESELECT - In icon view moves the state image of the control to the top right

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_SIMPLESELECT - In icon view moves the state image of the control to the top right

trans-unit.source: $LVS_EX_UNDERLINECOLD - Causes non-hot items that may be activated to be displayed with underlined text

target.mrk: $LVS_EX_UNDERLINEHOT - Causes hot items that may be activated to be displayed with underlined text

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies which styles in $iExStyle are to be affected.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies which styles in $iExStyle are to be affected.

target.mrk: Specifies which styles in $iExStyle are to be affected.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be a combination of extended styles. Only the extended styles in $iExMask will be changed.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be a combination of extended styles.
Only the extended styles in $iExMask will be changed.

target.mrk: This parameter can be a combination of extended styles.
Only the extended styles in $iExMask will be changed.

trans-unit.source: All other styles will be maintained as they are.

seg-source.mrk: All other styles will be maintained as they are.

target.mrk: All other styles will be maintained as they are.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is zero, all of the styles in $iExStyle will be affected.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is zero, all of the styles in $iExStyle will be affected.

target.mrk: If this parameter is zero, all of the styles in $iExStyle will be affected.
